column1: Mean score and variation in reading performance
Information on data for Cyprus: https://oe.cd/cyprus-disclaimer
*Hong Kong (China), Netherlands, Portugal and United States: Data did not meet the PISA technical standards but were accepted as largely comparable (see Annexes A2 and A4).

***The data for Viet Nam have not yet been fully validated. Due to a lack of consistency in the response pattern of some performance data, the OECD cannot yet assure full international comparability of the results (see Annexes A4 and A6).
